Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Glacial Assault
Augment.Description: Adds the Glacial Assault set bonus.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Levik
Augment.Description: Adds the Levik's Defender set bonus.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Lorikk
Augment.Description: Adds the Lorikk's Champion set bonus.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Tharne
Augment.Description: Adds the Tharne's Wrath set bonus.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Dodging
Augment.Description: Dodge +3%: +3% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Natural Armor
Augment.Description: Natural Armor +4: Passive: +4 Natural Armor Bonus to Armor Class.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Insight
Augment.Description: Heightened Awareness 4: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +4 Insight bonus to AC.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Air
Augment.Description: Air Guard: This Weapon stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the user of this weapon is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Dust
Augment.Description: Disintegration Guard: This item has a store of dark, insidious power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally lashes out violently at enemies and attempts to disintegrate them.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Stoneskin
Augment.Description: Earthen Guard: When you are successfully attacked, there is a chance that a Stone Skin will be cast on you.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Earth
Augment.Description: Earthgrab Guard: This item stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Ash
Augment.Description: Enervation Guard: This item stores a menacing, ravenous power deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, draining the life force of the enemy and giving negative levels.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Ice
Augment.Description: Freezing Ice Guard: This item stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Dancing
Augment.Description: Melodic Guard: When being hit there is a chance for the opponent to dance.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Ooze
Augment.Description: Sundering Ooze Guard: This item stores the corrosive, voracious power of the ooze deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power can come to the surface, decreasing an opponents AC, and occasionally summoning a wild ooze that will fight against your enemies.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Radiance
Augment.Description: Radiance Guard: This item is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, the attacker has a chance of being hit by 4d6 points of light damage and has a chance of being blinded.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Crippling
Augment.Description: Adds Crippling to any equipped Melee weapon. A crippling weapon is infused with binding power so that when a target is critically hit their movement is slowed by half (making it crippled).

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Destruction
Augment.Description: Adds Destruction to any equipped Melee weapon. On Hit: Your target gains a stack of Armor Destruction. (-1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 second duration. Stacks up to 15 times.) This effect may trigger once every three seconds.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Smiting
Augment.Description: Adds Smiting to any equipped Melee/Ranged weapon. Smiting is a powerful weapon enchantment that may cause the death of a construct on a Vorpal Strike. Constructs suffer 4d6 additional damage per hit with a 100 Bane damage bonus on confirmed vorpal strikes if the construct has 1,000 or more current HP (or is immune to instant death, such as the red-/purple-named bosses such as the Portals in The Shroud), else a vorpal strike will kill it outright.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Threat
Augment.Description: Incite +20: +20% Enhancement bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Health
Augment.Description: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this items gives you a +20 bonus to your maximum hit points. This stacks with all bonuses except Greater Elemental Energy.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Spell Power
Augment.Description: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this items gives you a +100 bonus to your maximum spell points. This stacks with all bonuses except Greater Elemental Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Arcane Sigil
Augment.Description: Arcane Sigil: The arcane sigil inscribed on this item lowers the arcane spell failure chance by -10%.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Flame
Augment.Description: Combustion +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of the Inferno
Augment.Description: Combustion +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Life
Augment.Description: Devotion +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Chill
Augment.Description: Glaciation +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Cold Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Frost
Augment.Description: Glaciation +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Cold Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Sound
Augment.Description: Resonance +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Cacophony
Augment.Description: Resonance +84: Passive: +84 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Magic
Augment.Description: Potency +56: Passive: +56 Equipment bonus to Universal Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Power
Augment.Description: Potency +56: Passive: +56 Equipment bonus to Universal Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereign Rune of Spell Penetration
Augment.Description: Spell Penetration III: Passive: +3 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
